specialAbilities.name: Keen Smell
specialAbilities.description: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.
